preston sturges the comic technician is
at the height of his powers in this
movie the dialogue is a mile a minute
and there are some brilliantly executed
very fun and slapstick sight-gags
but what's most striking about this
movie is there's such warmth and
generosity of spirit so we feel sympathy
for these characters even as we're
laughing at just how absurd and
ridiculous and this is characteristic of
the preston sturges touch in the miracle
of morgan creaks he takes what could be
what should be maybe a tawdry even
tragic story of small-town scandal and
turns it into a buoyant and graceful
comedy
sturgeons made his best movies between
1940 and 1944 a time of economic crisis
at World War and he evolved something of
a formula the grimmer of the reality two
sillier the response but this response
was never mean trivializing or
nihilistic the way that so many comedies
made these days it's a shame that we've
misplaced this formula just at a time
when we need it most but maybe someone
will rediscover it that would be America
